Nightlight:::


Nightlight was decided to support Rodimus altoguth she had to risk 
her live. She concentrate her energy and shoot three huge energy 
balls against Hydras.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus comes down but takes the laser blasts just over his 
shoulder. They damage his fenders. Roddy came down shooting three 
photon beams from his left forarm mount at Hydras. Roddy also slashes 
at Hydras with the saw blade from his right hand.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I can take the heat, can you?!
